attributes.action: demand that Jacqui Smith repays her wrongly claimed expenses - an apology is not enough.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: She was found to have claimed the money wrongly by a standards enquiry, she admits she was wrong, she has apologised to that effect. Given all of that, why isn't she paying back the money that isn't hers? If you're guilty of stealing you have to pay it back.

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament or with the relevant political party(ies).
reasons: The names of individuals, or information where they may be identified, in relation to criminal accusations
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
